_sText:
In This v3, i have remove bug, more balanced with ct cant camp and zombie too, it s now the good version !
this map is based of the movie starship troopers 1, i immit the left post 29, with the monster tanker (boss) and a tiger (boss 2) you kill first boss when you shoot on the head, after you continue, you take the bomb and you go kill the 2nd boss. After you put the bomb and run run run !!! 70 sec for escape...
it s very possible ! Map original, all boss have an attack and can kill ct ! no buged, balanced and very balanced with a good cover of ct ! Add me on your server :D
